#summary Requirements
= Requirements =

Here is a parts list of Cloudosys.  You do not have to worry about installing these manually.
  * *Google Gears* http://gears.google.com (Auto detect)
  * *YUI* http://developer.yahoo.com/yui/ (You do not need to download this as it's part of the zip file.)
  * Cloudosys PHP backend script - public server at: http://www.cloudosys.com/cloudosys/
